item.title: WeChat-iOS15 Mock Icon
item.description: It is rumored that #iOS15 will use a new icon design language. It will finally be more than just plain flat. I understand that the new icons will follow that on the Mac which used more highlights and shadows, so I guess the WeChat icon would look something like this… Video not supported, clickdownload for watching
